short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyword cpc, competition and search volume to Open Site Explorer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See keyword data for anchor text phrases right in Open Site Explorer

The anchor text tab gets cpc, search volume and competition data added right into the table

Don't forget to add your API key in the options or it wont work

Get an API key from:
http://grepwords.com
